page.title: 20A Day With Stephanie cont.
page.content:
The morning ends at 11.55am and we eat our lunch in the canteen. We play in the playground until 1.25pm when after- noon school begins. In the afternoon we do painting or modelling, projects or games. We finish school at 3.20pm. I wait for mummy to finish taking the children across the road and then we walk home. I change out of school uni- form and do any homework I have. Then I read or watch television until 6.30pm when daddy comes home from work and we have our dinner. Afterwards we either play a board game like Cluedo or watch television until it is time to go to bed at 8.00pm. I always have a wash or a bath and clean my teeth before I go to bed.
By Brandon Hill School
